msbt.message: Whoa! Are you sure? I mean, living here would really help me take things to the level AFTER nextOK, I'm in! I'll call Resident Services and work it out with them.
Wow! You're really getting those invite reps in. That kind of focused determination is super inspiring.OK, I'm in! I'll call Resident Services and work it out with them.
Huh? Live here? That'd be awesome butno can do, .It took years to get my workout gear set up exactly right. I just can't go through that again right now.

Huh?! Move here? Wow, that would be so awesâ€” Nope, I can't do it.See, I've been working on a new protein shake recipe for months, and I think I've almost cracked it.The formula's SUPER complex. I even had to buy a whiteboard.Long story short, if I disturb the starter mix now, I'll have to start over. Sorry, but I gotta stay put.

Move here? As awesome as that might be, I don't think it'd be right.I want folks to get swole, but when I look around here, everyone's muscles are already magnificent.I just think my talents should go to an island that needs them more. Sorry, but I'm gonna pass.
Huh?! Really? Wow, I don't know what to say, Tell you what. Let's have the mighty muscles of fate decide!We're gonna play a quick game, and if you win, I'll move here. Sound fun?
Super fun. Let's do it!
No, thanks.
What? You wanna draft me onto Team ?Alright, if you want my stats on your squad, you gotta play a little game. If you win, I'll move here. You ready?
I was born ready!
I don't know...
Me? Move here? Do you really think you've got what it takes to be MY neighbor, ?Ha! There's only one way to find out! We're are gonna have us a contest. If you win, I'll move here. You game?
Oh, it's on!
Nah.
Oh! Really? I guess the mighty muscles of fate are feeling kinda sore today,
Wellalright. Back to the draft pool for me, !
Oh. Well, that's alright. Honestly, I'm not sure if even I have what it takes to be my neighbor, .
Then we got us a card game!It's real simple. I'm gonna draw a card, and you've gotta guess something about it. Game on!
Victory is mine! Which is too bad 'cause I was REALLY looking forward to lifting all my stuff
That was some solid play calling, but I'm the victor.
Can't win 'em all. Plus, I hear defeat is the best teacher anyway.
Well, that was awesome! Oh! I hope you had fun too, .
I hope you had as much fun as I did. 'Cause I had lots, !
Sowhen's the victory parade gonna be, ?
Alright, I'm throwing in the towel. You do like towels, right, uh , huh? Cool.Well, you wanted to live on ? You got it, !Erprobably. Still gotta check with Resident Services first.
I know when I'm beat. What's your name again? ? Very cool, !Well, once I get things squared away with Resident Services, I guess I'll be your new neighbor. is of his word.

Way to take a challenge seriously! And triumph, for that matter.Oh, uhwhat's your name again, champion? ? Nice to meet you, .Alright, you're on. I'm gonna go tell Resident Services you want to add to your roster!

Bad news. I checked with Resident Services and they said moving here was a no-go.Basically, there's not enough room on the island for both me AND my scary-huge arms, .Although, they DID say if someone moved out, I could move in Mind if I try to strike a deal with someone?
Go for it!
Nah.
Hmm Having a giant-armed stranger come ask you to leave the island? Probably not cool.
Can do! Resident Services actually told me a few folks to talk to. Who should I start with, ?
Talk to about moving out? You sure?
Yep!
Hang on! Not them.
Uh... Let's just drop it.
Alright, I'm on it. Maybe they'll say no, but there's no harm in asking!
Oh! Close one. Alright, who should I talk to, then?
Oha-alright,

Well that went great! The instant that saw me coming, started packing up.I barely even had to speak. I went over, told the situation, showed off my arms some, and that was that! seemed really nice. Kinda nervous, though. I hope likes new home, !Anyway, what was your name again? , right? See you around, !
Huh? You don't think anyone would be interested?
Someone would be...
Pretty much.
All good. So, who should I talk to about moving out, ?
Oh. Well, if you say so, we can just forget it, .
Alright! The heat is on! Let me pitch an idea Whaddaya think of trading away for me?Resident Services passed me the name, so I thought I'd see if it was a hole in one.Should I talk to about a trade?
Do it!
No can do.
Foul ball, huh? Well, I understand. Maybe next season, .
So I talked to Resident Services. They said there isn't room for anyone else, .It's understandable. I am pretty buff, after all. Wouldn't want my hugeness to push someone off the island!

Hey! So I just got word back from Resident Services. We're gonna be neighbors, !Just wait till everyone gets a look at these biceps. I mean, I live with 'em and I'm still impressed!Oh hey, what was your name again? , right? See you later, !
Actually, I think I'll check with Resident Services again.Who knows? Maybe I'll get lucky this time, !
Yeah! Do it!
I'm not so sure...
You're probably right. If it was cool for me to move there, they would've said so by now, .Plus, if I keep bugging them, I'll get a bad rep. Fewer bad reps, more lifting reps! That's my motto!
They told me the island wasn't accepting any more residents. I had no idea it was so popular!With how many calories I burn every day, I guess I can't blame them for turning me down, !
My workouts have been SUPER good since I got here. I'm totally crushing every personal best I have!If I stick around much longer, my ripped bod's gonna get even MORE ripped-er, !
Stick around, then!
Stay hydrated.

You mean like move here? Tempting. HmmIf I lived here, I'd never stop working out, and then I'd never get to bask in that sweet, sweet muscle soreness.But then, more workouts isn't exactly a bad thing Yeah, I can't decide right now. I'm gonna punt.I'll always be down for coming back, though. Ask me again next time.
Yes! Thanks! Hydration is one of the most important parts ofeverything really, ! Solid advice.
This place is great! I didn't expect so many folks here to be interested in my workout routines, .Usually everyone tunes out my constant muscle talk after about five minutes, but not here!
Stick around! Talk muscles!
Can't imagine why.

Like, live here? Oh. Hmm!This place has some serious muscle potential, but I think I wanna spread the buffness elsewhere right now. It's super tempting, though Yeah, I can't decide.How about you invite me over again and ask me then, ?
Neither can I! All I want is to help everyone get a ripped bod of their very own, .So here I am, getting super swole so I can set a good example!
